content:
To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You is a wonderful choice!

Regarding your soundbar, I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have access to specific information about your soundbar model or its compatibility with Netflix.

But don't worry, it's easy to check! Here are a few steps to help you determine if your soundbar is compatible with Netflix:

1. Check your soundbar's manual or manufacturer's website for information on its compatibility with streaming services like Netflix.
2. Look for HDMI ports on your soundbar. If it has an HDMI ARC (Audio Return Channel) port, it's likely compatible with Netflix.
3. Check your TV's settings to see if it supports HDMI ARC and can pass through audio to your soundbar.
4. If you're still unsure, you can try connecting your soundbar to your TV and seeing if it recognizes the Netflix app. You can also try playing a Netflix show or movie and see if the audio comes through your soundbar.

If you're still having trouble, you can consult your soundbar's customer support or contact Netflix's support team for further assistance.

Enjoy your movie night, and I hope your soundbar works perfectly with Netflix!
